parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty passenger seat airbag sensor can cause the airbag to not deploy in the event of a crash, even if a passenger is present, which can lead to serious injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag warning light stays on
the passenger airbag sensor is faulty
the airbag system is disabled
the seat belt indicator light is intermittent
the airbag fault light is on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPS system can cause the vehicle to become extremely difficult to steer, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at low speeds.
symptoms: The power steering stops working
making it very hard to turn the wheel
the steering becomes heavy or difficult
the power steering pump fails
the battery light on the console turns on
the passenger airbag warning light stays on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause loss of power, unexpected acceleration, and sudden loss of control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission electronically disengages
allowing the engine to rev uncontrollably
causing sudden acceleration or loss of power; the transmission fails to engage
causing the vehicle to slow down or lose power; grinding or crunching noises from the transmission.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Clutch failure can cause difficulty shifting gears, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
difficulty shifting into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Harmonic balancer failure can cause sudden loss of power, unexpected acceleration, and sudden loss of control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Loud pop followed by crunching noises from the harmonic balancer
sudden loss of power
unexpected acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The use of substandard materials and manufacturing can lead to premature failures of various components, causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Brittle and cracked engine and transmission mounts
curled seat belts
faulty drip seal rubber
brittle and substandard hoses (power steering
radiator
and other hoses).
